name: Suspicious Recursif Takeown
description: Adversaries can interact with the DACLs using built-in Windows commands takeown which can grant adversaries higher permissions on specific files and folders
false_positives: Scripts created by developers and admins
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\takeown.exe AND process.command_line:*\/f\ * AND process.command_line:*\/r*)`
